com.ephesoft.dcma.workflows.client

Interface EphesoftWebServiceClient

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    EphesoftWebServiceClientImpl

    public interface EphesoftWebServiceClient
    This class is used to initializing the web services. It is used to preparing and transferring information from one instance to another instance.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Ephesoft
    See Also:
    com.ephesoft.dcma.workflow.client.EphesoftWebServiceClientImpl
